channel.title: <![CDATA[ Gremlin RSS Feed ]]>
channel.description: <![CDATA[ Prevent outages, innovate faster, and earn customer trust with Gremlin’s Reliability Management and Chaos Engineering platform. ]]>

item.title: 【Manage your reliability work more easily with Gremlin’s newest features】使用 Gremlin 的最新功能更轻松地管理您的可靠性工作
item.description: 【Gremlin has three new ways to help you monitor and manage your reliability efforts. See how to track current, future, and past activity in Gremlin.】Gremlin 提供了三种新方法来帮助您监控和管理可靠性工作。了解如何跟踪 Gremlin 中当前、未来和过去的活动。

item.title: 【Maximizing your reliability on AWS】最大限度提高 AWS 的可靠性
item.description: 【Learn how to maximize reliability when running workloads on Amazon EC2, EKS, ECS, and other services.】了解在 Amazon EC2、EKS、ECS 和其他服务上运行工作负载时如何最大限度地提高可靠性。

item.title: 【Release Roundup November 2024: Reliability in the serverless and AI era】2024 年 11 月发布综述：无服务器和人工智能时代的可靠性
item.description: 【A review of the major product and feature releases from September to November 2024, including Service Mesh via Failure Flags, AWS PrivateLink in Marketplace, RM & FI scheduling improvements, and agent updates.】对 2024 年 9 月至 11 月主要产品和功能版本的回顾，包括通过故障标志的服务网格、Marketplace 中的 AWS PrivateLink、RM 和 FI 调度改进以及代理更新。

item.title: 【Gremlin's 2024 year-end Release Roundup】Gremlin 2024 年年终发布综述
item.description: 【This is a mega-roundup of everything Gremlin's released in 2024. From AWS to serverless to all-new experiments, it's all here!】这是 Gremlin 在 2024 年发布的所有内容的大型综述。从 AWS 到无服务器再到全新的实验，都在这里！

item.title: 【Best Practices for Testing Zone Redundancy】测试区冗余的最佳实践
item.description: 【Gremlin Principal Software Engineer Sam Rossoff shares key best practices and strategies for effectively testing zone redundancy.】Gremlin 首席软件工程师 Sam Rossoff 分享了有效测试区域冗余的关键最佳实践和策略。

item.title: 【Reliable AI models, simulations, and more with Gremlin's GPU experiment】通过 Gremlin 的 GPU 实验实现可靠的 AI 模型、模拟等
item.description: 【Build more resilient machine learning and AI models, video streaming, simulations, and more with Gremlin’s GPU experiment.】利用 Gremlin 的 GPU 实验构建更具弹性的机器学习和 AI 模型、视频流、模拟等。

item.title: 【How reliability engineering can verify disaster recovery plans】可靠性工程如何验证灾难恢复计划
item.description: 【Learn how reliability engineering and Gremlin can help test your disaster recovery plans to make sure you’re prepared—and compliant with regulations.】了解可靠性工程和 Gremlin 如何帮助测试您的灾难恢复计划，以确保您做好准备并遵守法规。

item.title: 【Now in private beta: Gremlin Service Mesh Extension】现在处于私人测试版：Gremlin Service Mesh Extension
item.description: 【Find out how to safely test applications and services behind service meshes with the Gremlin Service Mesh Extension.】了解如何使用 Gremlin 服务网格扩展安全地测试服务网格背后的应用程序和服务。

item.title: 【What’s the ROI of reliability?】可靠性的投资回报率是多少？
item.description: 【Learn how to compute the ROI of a reliability or Chaos Engineering program, including how to quantify the positive impact your efforts created for the company.】了解如何计算可靠性或混沌工程计划的投资回报率，包括如何量化您的努力为公司创造的积极影响。

item.title: 【Seven tests to measure and improve reliability: what matters and how it works】衡量和提高可靠性的七项测试：重要因素及其工作原理
item.description: 【Learn how to take reliability from a "nice to have" to a standard operating practice within your organization. We'll show you seven easy tests you can use to start building resilient systems.】了解如何将可靠性从“可有可无”转变为组织内的标准操作实践。我们将向您展示七个可用于开始构建弹性系统的简单测试。
